(Requires attunement by a creature. The properties of this item are affixed to a rod, wand, staff, jewelry, or armor.)

This item is a @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.rules.JournalEntry.nniVtdJB1oyk5Sa3]{locus} and can be combined with other Loci per the @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.rules.JournalEntry.nniVtdJB1oyk5Sa3.JournalEntryPage.zI0VWGKnYZqz6sKd]{Combining Loci} rules.

This relic was found affixed to one end of an ancient rod. The half of the rod associated with this Locus was tinted gold.

While attuned the relic merges magically merges with a rod, wand, staff, jewelry, or armor of your choice. This can be done during a short or long rest, requires 10 minutes to complete and upon completion the item takes on a golden hue and sheen. Once completed, the item becomes magical for the purpose of overcoming resistances.

Effect: While on the Material plane on Materia from Dawn to Dusk your walking speed is increased by 10 feet. Furthermore, when creatures within 30 feet of you that deal damage to you must succeed a Constitution saving throw or be blinded until the end of your next turn. A creature that does not rely on sight is immune to this effect.

If you are not on Materia or not on the Material Plane, then you only benefit from the first bonus granted by both the @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.magic-items.Item.NZC6FpoRO0P4sZeY]{Locus: Syzygy (Sun)} and @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.magic-items.Item.d4kJXuBWLAgCCWTp]{Locus: Syzygy (Moon)}.
